HOME.TITLE: We are responsible for transmitting security and transparency.
HOME.DESCRIPTION: Alarm Geo Fire gives you the peace of mind you need in emergency situations. Offering a free version and a paid version to suit your needs.

COMUNITY.TITLE: What do you expect to be a part of?
COMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: We are a global community. Inclusive, supportive and collaborative.

NEW_TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Do you want to leave us your testimony?
NEW_TESTIMONIALS.DESCRIPTION: We love knowing what works and what doesn't, by getting in touch you help us improve a lot. Not to mention how amazing it is to hear that our users find the app useful!

BUSINESS.TITLE: Upgrade to our premium version
BUSINESS.DESCRIPTION: Get greater control and advanced features with our paid subscription. Join us!

PRICING.TITLE: We adjust to your needs
PRICING.DESCRIPTION: There is a plan for every type of organization
PRICING.PRICE_TWO: Subscription for government and public sector
PRICING.PRICE_THREE: Special subscription for MSMEs and NGOs

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact the team
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: We love staying in touch with you!

DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_CONECTION: Certain features do not require an internet connection.
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_MORE: Don't miss everything we're working on.
DESCRIPTION.DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS: Designed to serve you in any everyday situation.

SPONSOR.TITLE: Be part of supporting Alarm Geo Fire
SPONSOR.SUBTITLE: Be a sponsor
SPONSOR.DESCRIPTION: Thanks to the people who contribute to the project, we can impact the lives of thousands of people throughout the entire planet.

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About us
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION: Alarm Geo Fire is a solution developed by NO TECH, an Argentine company that seeks to change the world with technology. Stay up to date with the latest news here!
